subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Flat Out made his first win of the year a big one, edging Stay Thirsty in the final strides to take the $1 million Jockey Club Gold Cup at Belmont Park.
snippet: Flat Out made his first win of the year a big one, edging Stay Thirsty in the final strides to take the $1 million Jockey Club Gold Cup at Belmont Park.
